mapper.insert: INSERT INTO time_card( member_no, work_pattern, work_place, work_day_start, work_off_check) VALUES( #{member_no}, #{work_pattern}, #{work_place}, SYSDATE(), 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE time_card SET work_day_end = SYSDATE(), work_note = #{work_note}, work_off_check = 1 WHERE member_no = #{member_no} AND date_format(work_day_start, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE() AND work_off_check = 0
